column2: 𓀗𓁡  𓀔𓀀𓁖  𓀄𓁼𓁼𓀫  𓁡𓀬𓀬  𓀡𓀬𓀫𓀐   𓁖𓀗𓀫𓀈𓁼  𓀗  𓀔𓀀𓁬𓁼  𓀔𓀀𓀉  𓀀  𓀈𓀬𓀫𓁬𓁼𓁉𓁖𓁡𓀗𓀬𓀫
column3: It has been too long since I have had a conversation

column2: Hm? Are you talking to me? Wait, do you...understand me? No one has understood me down here for over a hundred years...it is quite pleasant to finally have a conversation with someone. I do hope you are quite well.
𓀗𓁡  𓀔𓀀𓁖  𓀄𓁼𓁼𓀫  𓁡𓀬𓀬  𓀡𓀬𓀫𓀐   𓁖𓀗𓀫𓀈𓁼  𓀗  𓀔𓀀𓁬𓁼  𓀔𓀀𓀉  𓀀  𓀈𓀬𓀫𓁬𓁼𓁉𓁖𓁡𓀗𓀬𓀫
